cast.overview: After an altercation between Alex, the president's son, and Britain's Prince Henry at a royal event becomes tabloid fodder, their long-running feud now threatens to drive a wedge in U.S./British relations. When the rivals are forced into a staged truce, their icy relationship begins to thaw and the friction between them sparks something deeper than they ever expected.
cast.title: Red, White & Royal Blue

details.biography:
Casey McQuiston is an American author of romance novels in the new adult fiction genre, best known for their New York Times best-selling debut novel Red, White & Royal Blue, in which the son of America's first woman president falls in love with a prince of England, and sophomore book One Last Stop.

They attended Louisiana State University and received a degree in journalism. McQuiston currently lives in New York City, New York with their poodle mix, Pepper.
details.name: Casey McQuiston
